definition.description: Path to the document definition file

validation.description: Path to the schema validation file

enumDescriptions.element: Specifies this document as an element class type
Defines the property list name for element documents

class_version.description: Version number of the document class

definition.description: Path to the base document definition

enumDescriptions.$NDIDOCUMENTPATH/base.json: References the base document definition file for inheritance

depends_on.description: Document dependencies with validation rules. Each dependency is specified as a name/value pair.

enumDescriptions.underlying_element_id: Identifier linking to the underlying element document. May be empty.
enumDescriptions.subject_id: Identifier linking to the subject document. Must not be empty.

ndi_element_class.description: The name of the ndi.element class that is stored.

name.description: The name of element. Elements are uniquely defined by a name, reference, and type.

reference.description: The reference number of the element. Elements are uniquely defined by a name, reference, and type.

type.description: The type of the element. Common probe types are in probetype2object.json

direct.description: Does this element directly feed data from an underlying element?

enumDescriptions.0: Element does not directly feed data from underlying element
enumDescriptions.1: Element directly feeds data from underlying element

allOf.description: Inherits all properties from base schema
